mapper.select: SELECT t1.id,t1.node_code AS nodeCode,t1.use_water_unit_id AS useWaterUnitId,t1.unit_name AS unitName,t1.unit_code AS unitCode, t1.water_meter_code AS waterMeterCode,t1.plan_year AS planYear, t1.cur_year_plan AS curYearPlan,t1.first_quarter AS firstQuarter,t1.second_quarter AS secondQuarter, t1.third_quarter AS thirdQuarter,t1.fourth_quarter AS fourthQuarter, t1.plan_type AS planType, (SELECT dict_item_name FROM t_dict_item WHERE dict_id =(SELECT id FROM t_dict WHERE dict_code = 'changeType') AND dict_item_code = t1.plan_type ) AS planTypeName, CONVERT(varchar(100), t1.create_time, 23) AS updateTime,t1.printed AS printed,t1.status AS status, t1.remarks AS remarks FROM t_w_use_water_plan_add t1 WHERE t1.node_code =#{nodeCode} AND t1.unit_code =#{unitCode} AND t1.plan_year =#{planYear} ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC

select unit_code as unitCode, unit_name as unitName, count_quarter as countQuarter, count_year as countYear from t_w_water_use_pay_info where use_water_unit_id=#{use_water_unit_id} and pay_status != '1' and pay_status != '5' order by count_year desc,count_quarter desc

SELECT uu.unit_code, MAX (m.water_meter_code) AS water_meter_code, uu.unit_name, p.plan_year, p.cur_year_plan, p.first_quarter, p.second_quarter, p.third_quarter, p.fourth_quarter, CONVERT(varchar(100), p.update_time, 23) as update_time, MAX ('当前计划') AS plan_type, p.remarks FROM t_w_use_water_unit uu, t_w_use_water_plan p, t_w_use_water_unit_meter m WHERE uu.id = p.use_water_unit_id AND uu.id = m.use_water_unit_id AND uu.id IN (SELECT id FROM t_w_use_water_unit WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} AND SUBSTRING(unit_code,5,2) IN ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id = #{userId} ) ) AND p.plan_year = #{planYear} AND p.plan_type = '0' group by uu.unit_code,uu.unit_name,p.plan_year,p.cur_year_plan,p.first_quarter, p.second_quarter,p.third_quarter,p.fourth_quarter,p.update_time,p.remarks order by uu.unit_code
